ActNational Capital Act
SubjectLease with 1770685 Ontario Inc. ** NCC **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to grant four options of five years each, commencing on May 1, 2018, 2023, 2028 and 2033 respectively, to renew an existing five year lease with 1770685 ONTARIO INC. operating as The Earl of Sussex Pub, with Ryan Oâ€™Connor and Anthony Maddalena, to occupy a property located at 431 Sussex Drive in Ottawa.
